name: Alhambra
shortDescription: A vibrant city in the San Gabriel Valley blending historic charm, diverse culture, and a thriving dining scene.
fullDescription: Alhambra, located just east of downtown Los Angeles, is known for its rich cultural diversity, historic architecture, and bustling food scene. The city features a lively Main Street with shops, restaurants, and entertainment, along with quiet residential neighborhoods and tree-lined streets. Its central location offers convenient access to Pasadena, Downtown LA, and surrounding San Gabriel Valley communities. With strong schools, community events, and a blend of old and new, Alhambra is an ideal choice for those seeking a dynamic yet comfortable urban lifestyle.
heroImageAlt: Street view in Alhambra with palm trees and storefronts

neighborhoods.name: San Gabriel
neighborhoods.description: Neighboring city known for its historic mission, Asian dining, and suburban neighborhoods.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Historic mission architecture in San Gabriel

neighborhoods.name: Monterey Park
neighborhoods.description: City celebrated for its authentic Asian cuisine, parks, and community-oriented living.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Asian-inspired architectural details in Monterey Park

neighborhoods.name: Pasadena
neighborhoods.description: Famous for the Rose Parade, cultural institutions, and vibrant Old Town.

neighborhoods.name: El Monte
neighborhoods.description: Diverse city known for parks, schools, and a strong sense of community.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Park and residential area in El Monte

highlights.title: Alhambra Main Street
highlights.description: Bustling corridor with shopping, dining, and entertainment options.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Main Street at dusk with shops and people walking

highlights.title: Historic Alhambra Theatre
highlights.description: A landmark movie palace showcasing live performances and community events.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Classic theatre building lit up at night

highlights.title: Dining Capital of San Gabriel Valley
highlights.description: From dim sum to Mexican street food, Alhambra offers a global dining experience.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Asian noodle dish in a bowl

highlights.title: Almansor Park
highlights.description: Popular community park with sports facilities, a lake, and walking paths.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Tree-lined park path with sunlight filtering through leaves

faqs.question: What is Alhambra known for?
faqs.answer: Alhambra is known for its cultural diversity, thriving dining scene, and historic landmarks.

faqs.question: How is the real estate market in Alhambra?
faqs.answer: The real estate market in Alhambra is competitive, with demand for both historic homes and modern condos.

faqs.question: What are popular things to do in Alhambra?
faqs.answer: Stroll along Main Street, enjoy diverse dining, visit Almansor Park, or catch a show at the Historic Alhambra Theatre.

faqs.question: How is commuting from Alhambra?
faqs.answer: Alhambra offers quick access to I-10 and nearby Metro Gold Line stations, making commutes to Downtown LA and Pasadena convenient.
